articles.title: Soccer-Dudamel resigns as Venezuelan national team coach
articles.description: Rafael Dudamel left his post as coach of the Venezuelan national team on Thursday, saying his relationship with officials had deteriorated to the point that it was better to resign.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia bans insurance and re-insurance activities within the same firm
